job_details.Functieomschrijving:
AI is transforming industries, but in critical environments, it must be reliable, scalable, and secure. At TNO, we develop AI-driven systems that make autonomous decisions in complex, real-world scenarios-from defence intelligence networks and adaptive energy grids to biodiversity digital twins that support environmental policy. As an Artificial Intelligence Systems Engineer, you will contribute to the research, development, and implementation of AI solutions that directly impact vital infrastructure. You will work with leading experts in AI, distributed systems, and software engineering to develop innovative applications that bridge the gap between fundamental research and practical deployment. This role offers an opportunity to apply state-of-the-art AI techniques to real-world problems, collaborate with experts in multiple disciplines, and develop AI solutions that make a tangible difference in society.
       What will be your role?
       As an AI Software Engineer, you will be involved in the full lifecycle of AI solutions, from research and experimentation to building and deploying robust AI models and AI-based systems. Your role includes:
          + Developing AI-driven software that enhances autonomy in cyber-physical systems.
          + Building proof-of-concept applications and demonstrators that translate AI research into practical, scalable solutions.
          + Optimizing and deploying AI models, ensuring performance, reliability, and efficiency.
          + Collaborating with multidisciplinary teams, including experts in AI, systems engineering, and domain-specific applications.
          + Exploring cutting-edge AI techniques and evaluating their real-world applicability in critical infrastructure and in when interacting with physical processes.
       You will work on projects such as:
          + AI Agents for Military Intelligence - Developing generative AI agents that assist analysts in filtering large-scale data for actionable insights.
          + Foundation Models for Biodiversity - Creating AI-powered cognitive digital twins to monitor environmental patterns and support sustainability policies.
          + GPT-NL - Contributing to data curation and training pipelines for the first large-scale, lawful Dutch AI language model.
       What we expect from you
job_details.full_text:
Artificial Intelligence Systems Engineer

AI is transforming industries, but in critical environments, it must be reliable, scalable, and secure. At TNO, we develop AI-driven systems that make autonomous decisions in complex, real-world scenarios-from defence intelligence networks and adaptive energy grids to biodiversity digital twins that support environmental policy. As an Artificial Intelligence Systems Engineer, you will contribute to the research, development, and implementation of AI solutions that directly impact vital infrastructure. You will work with leading experts in AI, distributed systems, and software engineering to develop innovative applications that bridge the gap between fundamental research and practical deployment. This role offers an opportunity to apply state-of-the-art AI techniques to real-world problems, collaborate with experts in multiple disciplines, and develop AI solutions that make a tangible difference in society.
       What will be your role?
       As an AI Software Engineer, you will be involved in the full lifecycle of AI solutions, from research and experimentation to building and deploying robust AI models and AI-based systems. Your role includes:
          + Developing AI-driven software that enhances autonomy in cyber-physical systems.
          + Building proof-of-concept applications and demonstrators that translate AI research into practical, scalable solutions.
          + Optimizing and deploying AI models, ensuring performance, reliability, and efficiency.
          + Collaborating with multidisciplinary teams, including experts in AI, systems engineering, and domain-specific applications.
          + Exploring cutting-edge AI techniques and evaluating their real-world applicability in critical infrastructure and in when interacting with physical processes.
       You will work on projects such as:
          + AI Agents for Military Intelligence - Developing generative AI agents that assist analysts in filtering large-scale data for actionable insights.
          + Foundation Models for Biodiversity - Creating AI-powered cognitive digital twins to monitor environmental patterns and support sustainability policies.
          + GPT-NL - Contributing to data curation and training pipelines for the first large-scale, lawful Dutch AI language model.
       What we expect from you

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the development, fine-tuning, and deployment of AI solutions, particularly generative AI agents and foundation models. It highlights building proof-of-concept applications, optimizing and deploying AI models, and working with large-scale language models. The projects mentioned, such as 'AI Agents for Military Intelligence' and 'Foundation Models for Biodiversity', along with the mention of 'generative AI agents' and 'large-scale Dutch AI language model', strongly align with the core responsibilities and typical projects of a GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'developing AI-driven software that enhances autonomy' and 'building proof-of-concept applications and demonstrators that translate AI research into practical, scalable solutions' directly relates to creating and implementing AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Developing AI-driven software that enhances autonomy

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Optimizing and deploying AI models, ensuring performance, reliability, and efficiency' clearly falls under the modeling category, focusing on the refinement and operationalization of models.

The phrase 'AI-driven systems that make autonomous decisions in complex, real-world scenarios' and 'develop innovative applications that bridge the gap between fundamental research and practical deployment' indicates building software applications that integrate AI.
job_tasks.phrase: develop innovative applications that bridge the gap between fundamental research and practical deployment

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'building and deploying robust AI models and AI-based systems' implies the software engineering aspect of creating and releasing AI systems.
job_tasks.phrase: building and deploying robust AI models and AI-based systems

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Optimizing and deploying AI models, ensuring performance, reliability, and efficiency' also touches upon the operational aspects of making models ready for production.

The phrase 'AI is transforming industries, but in critical environments, it must be reliable, scalable, and secure' and 'support environmental policy' shows an understanding of the business context and impact of AI solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: AI is transforming industries, but in critical environments, it must be reliable, scalable, and secure

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'support environmental policy' indicates an understanding of the business domain and how AI can be applied to achieve policy goals.

The project 'AI Agents for Military Intelligence - Developing generative AI agents that assist analysts in filtering large-scale data for actionable insights' directly involves the creation and application of generative AI models.

The project 'Foundation Models for Biodiversity - Creating AI-powered cognitive digital twins to monitor environmental patterns and support sustainability policies' involves the development of advanced AI models (foundation models) for specific applications.
The project 'GPT-NL - Contributing to data curation and training pipelines for the first large-scale, lawful Dutch AI language model' explicitly mentions training large AI language models.
job_tasks.phrase: training pipelines for the first large-scale, lawful Dutch AI language model
